document_data.name: Shield of lightning protection
document_data.mainbody: A '''''shield of lightning protection''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[tower shield]] used to repel lightning.
document_data.Description: These blue tower shields were used by underground dwellers to combat all sources of lightning. In particular, ''shields of lightning'' warded against ''[[lightning bolt]]'' spells, as well as lightning spell traps. Such shields were found in [[dwarf]] settlements above [[Menzoberranzan]], such as in the [[Temple of Dumathoin]].
